Name: header
Question: header
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Information About The Source Of The Report And Publishing Organization'S Details,,,,,,,,,

Name: licensing
Question: licensing
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Type Of Licensing Applicable For The Sharing Of The Report,,,,,,,,,

Name: formatVersion
Question: formatVersion
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Version Of The Specification Of This Set Of Schemas Defining The Report'S Fields,,,,,,,,,

Name: formatVersionSpecificationUri
Question: formatVersionSpecificationUri
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Uri Of The Present Specification Of This Set Of Schemas,,,,,,,,,

Name: reportId
Question: reportId
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Unique Identifier Of This Report,Preferably As A Uuid4 String,,,,,,,,

Name: reportDatetime
Question: reportDatetime
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Publishing Date Of This Report In Format Yyyy-Mm-Dd Hh:Mm:Ss,,,,,,,,,

Name: reportStatus
Question: reportStatus
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Status Of This Report,,,,,,

Name: publisher
Question: publisher
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Details About The Publishing Organization Who Produced The Report,,,,,,,,,

Name: name
Question: name
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Name Of The Organization,,,,,,,,,

Name: division
Question: division
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Name Of The Publishing Department Within The Organization,,,,,,,,,

Name: projectName
Question: projectName
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Name Of The Publishing Project Within The Organization,,,,,,,,,

Name: confidentialityLevel
Question: confidentialityLevel
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Confidentiality Of The Report,,,,,,

Name: publicKey
Question: publicKey
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Cryptographic Public Key To Check The Identity Of The Publishing Organization,,,,,,,,,

Name: task
Question: task
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Nature Of The Task Being Measured,,,,,,,,,

Name: taskFamily
Question: taskFamily
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Family Of Task You Are Running,E.G. Text Classification,Image Generation,Speech Recognition,Robotics Navigation...,,,,,

Name: taskStage
Question: taskStage
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Stage Of The Task,Example: Datacreation,Preprocessing,Training,Finetuning,Inference,Retraining...,Add A + Between Stages If Several But We Do Recommand To Measure Each Step Independantly,,

Name: nbRequest
Question: nbRequest
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If Inference Stage,The Number Of Requests The Measure Corresponds To,0 Or Empty If You'Re Not Measuring The Inference Stage,,,,,,,

Name: algorithms
Question: algorithms
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The List Of The Main Algorithmic Approache(S) Used By The Computing Task,,,,,,,,,

Name: trainingType
Question: trainingType
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If Applicable,Type Of Training (If The Stage Corresponds To A Training) : Supervisedlearning,Unsupervisedlearning,Semisupervisedlearning,Reinforcementlearning,Transferlearning ...,,,,

Name: algorithmType
Question: algorithmType
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Type Of Algorithm Used,Example : Embeddings Creation,Rag,Nlp,Neural Network,Llm...,,,,

Name: algorithmName
Question: algorithmName
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Case-Sensitive Common Name Of The Algorithm,Example: Randomforest,Naive Bayes,Cnn,Rnn,Transformers,If You Are Directly Using A Foundation Model,Let It Empty And Fill The Field Foundationmodelname...,,

Name: algorithmUri
Question: algorithmUri
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Uri Of The Model,If Publicly Available,,,,,,,,

Name: foundationModelName
Question: foundationModelName
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If A Foundation Model Is Used,Its Case-Sensitive Common Name,Example: Llama3.1-8B,Gpt4-O...,,,,,,

Name: foundationModelUri
Question: foundationModelUri
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Uri Of The Foundation Model,If Publicly Available,,,,,,,,

Name: parametersNumber
Question: parametersNumber
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Number Of Billions Of Total Parameters Of Your Model,E.G. 8 For Llama3.1-8B,,,,,,,,

Name: framework
Question: framework
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Common Name Of The Software Framework Implementing The Algorithm,If Any,,,,,,,,

Name: frameworkVersion
Question: frameworkVersion
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Version Of The Software Framework Implementing The Algorithm,If Any,,,,,,,,

Name: classPath
Question: classPath
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Full Class Path Of The Algorithm Within The Framework,With Elements Separated By Dots,,,,,,,,

Name: layersNumber
Question: layersNumber
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If Deep Learning,Precise The Number Of Layers In Your Network,,,,,,,,

Name: epochsNumber
Question: epochsNumber
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If Training,The Number Of Complete Passes Through The Training Dataset,,,,,,,,

Name: optimizer
Question: optimizer
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Algorithm Used To Optimize The Models Weights,E.G. Gridsearch,Lora,Adam,,,,,,

Name: quantization
Question: quantization
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Type Of Quantization Used : Fp32,Fp16,B16,Int8 ...,,,,,,

Name: dataset
Question: dataset
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The List Of Dataset Processed And/Or Generated By The Computing Task,If You Are Working On Multipodal Training You Can Add Many Items To The List To Describe It. If You Are Working On Inference,You Can Add At Least One Item To Describe The Input Data And Another One For The Output,,,,,,,

Name: dataUsage
Question: dataUsage
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Use Of The Dataset: Is It Used As Model Input Or Output ?,,,,,,,,

Name: dataType
Question: dataType
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Nature Of The Data Used,,,,,,,,

Name: dataFormat
Question: dataFormat
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If The Data Is Passed In The Form Of A File,What Format Is The Data In?,,,,,,,,

Name: dataSize
Question: dataSize
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Size Of The Dataset (In Go),If Small Quantity Just Fill The Field Nbitems,,,,,,,,

Name: dataQuantity
Question: dataQuantity
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Number Of Data In The Dataset,E.G. 3 (Images,Audio Or Tokens),,,,,,,

Name: shape
Question: shape
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Shape Of Your Dataset,Can Be Found With X.Shape With Dataframes,E.G. (12,1000) For A 2D Table With 12 Columns And 1000 Rows,,,,,,

Name: source
Question: source
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Kind Of Source Of The Dataset,,,,,,,

Name: sourceUri
Question: sourceUri
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Uri Of The Dataset If Available,,,,,,,,,

Name: owner
Question: owner
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Owner Of The Dataset If Available,,,,,,,,,

Name: measuredAccuracy
Question: measuredAccuracy
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Measured Accuracy Of Your Model (Between 0 And 1),,,,,,,,,

Name: estimatedAccuracy
Question: estimatedAccuracy
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If You Didn'T Measure The Accuracy Of Your Model In Concrete Percentages,You Can Give An Assessment Of The Precision Between: Very Poor,Poor,Average,Good,Very Good

Name: taskDescription
Question: taskDescription
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Free Field,To Be Fillied In If You Have More Details To Share About Your Task,,,,,,,,

Name: measures
Question: measures
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Software And/Or Hardware Measures Of The Energy Consumed By The Computing Task,,,,,,,,,

Name: measurementMethod
Question: measurementMethod
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Method Used To Perform The Energy Or Flops Measure,Example: Codecarbon,Carbonai,Flops-Compute,Wattmeter,Azure Metrics,Ovh Metrics...,,,

Name: manufacturer
Question: manufacturer
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Name Of The Manufacturer,Example: Nvidia,,,,,,,,

Name: version
Question: version
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Version Of The Measuring Tool,If Any,,,,,,,,

Name: cpuTrackingMode
Question: cpuTrackingMode
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Method Used To Track The Consumption Of The Cpu,Example: Constant,Rapl...,,,,,,,

Name: gpuTrackingMode
Question: gpuTrackingMode
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Method Used To Track The Consumption Of The Gpu,Example: Constant,Nvml...,,,,,,,

Name: averageUtilizationCpu
Question: averageUtilizationCpu
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Average Percentage Of Use Of The Cpu During The Task,For Example: 0.5 If Your Cpu Load Was 50% On Average,,,,,,,,

Name: averageUtilizationGpu
Question: averageUtilizationGpu
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Average Percentage Of Use Of The Gpu During The Task,For Example: 0.8 If Your Gpu Load Was 80% On Average,,,,,,,,

Name: powerCalibrationMeasurement
Question: powerCalibrationMeasurement
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Power Consumed (In Kwh) During The Calibration Measure If Any (To Isolate The Initial Consumption Of The Hardware),,,,,,,,,

Name: durationCalibrationMeasurement
Question: durationCalibrationMeasurement
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Duration Of The Calibration If Any (In Seconds),,,,,,,,,

Name: powerConsumption
Question: powerConsumption
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Power Consumption Measure Of The Computing Task (In Kwh),,,,,,,,,

Name: measurementDuration
Question: measurementDuration
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Duration Of The Measurement (In Seconds),,,,,,,,,

Name: measurementDateTime
Question: measurementDateTime
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Date When The Measurement Began,In Format Yyyy-Mm-Dd Hh:Mm:Ss,,,,,,,,

Name: system
Question: system
Comment,,,,,,,,,: System Information Of The Infrastructure On Which Is Run The Computing Task,,,,,,,,,

Name: os
Question: os
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Name Of The Operating System,,,,,,,,,

Name: distribution
Question: distribution
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Distribution Of The Operating System,,,,,,,,,

Name: distributionVersion
Question: distributionVersion
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Distribution'S Version Of The Operating System,,,,,,,,,

Name: software
Question: software
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Programming Language Information Of The Computing Task,,,,,,,,,

Name: language
Question: language
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Name Of The Programming Language Used,Example : C,Java,Julia,Python...,,,,,

Name: version
Question: version
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Version Of The Measuring Tool,If Any,,,,,,,,

Name: infrastructure
Question: infrastructure
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Infrastructure On Which Is Performed The Computing Task,,,,,,,,,

Name: infraType
Question: infraType
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Type Of Infrastructure Used For The Task,,,,,,

Name: cloudProvider
Question: cloudProvider
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If You Are On The Cloud,The Name Of Your Cloud Provider,For Example : Aws,Azure,Google,Ovh...,,,,

Name: cloudInstance
Question: cloudInstance
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If You Are On A Cloud Vm,The Name Of Your Cloud Instance,For Example : A1.Large,Dasv4-Type2...,,,,,,

Name: cloudService
Question: cloudService
Comment,,,,,,,,,: If You Are Using An Ai Cloud Service,The Name Of Your Cloud Service,For Example : Openai Service...,,,,,,,

Name: components
Question: components
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Please Fill As Many Columns As You Need To Describe Your Components,,,,,,,,,

Name: componentName
Question: componentName
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Name Of This Subsystem Part Of Your Infrastructure,Example Returned By Codecarbon: 1 X Nvidia Geforce Gtx 1080 Ti,,,,,,,,

Name: componentType
Question: componentType
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Type Of This Subsystem Part Of Your Infrastructure,Example: Cpu,Gpu,Ram,Hdd,Sdd...,,,,

Name: nbComponent
Question: nbComponent
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Number Of Items Of This Component In Your Infrastructure,If You Have 1 Ram Of 32Go,Fill 1 Here And 32 Inside Memorysize,,,,,,,

Name: memorySize
Question: memorySize
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Size Of The Memory Of The Component In Gbytes,Useful To Detail The Memory Associated To One Of Your Gpus For Example (If We Want The Total Memory,We Will Multiply The Memorysize By Nbcomponent). If The Component Is Cpu Do Not Fill The Ram Size Here,Create Another Component For Ram,This Field Is For The Embeded Memory Of A Component.,,,,,

Name: manufacturer
Question: manufacturer
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Name Of The Manufacturer,Example: Nvidia,,,,,,,,

Name: family
Question: family
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Family Of This Component,Example: Geforce,,,,,,,,

Name: series
Question: series
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Series Of This Component,Example: Gtx1080,,,,,,,,

Name: share
Question: share
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Percentage Of The Physical Equipment Used By The Task,This Sharing Property Should Be Set To 1 By Default (If No Share) And Otherwise To The Correct Percentage,E.G. 0.5 If You Share Half-Time.,,,,,,,

Name: environment
Question: environment
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Environment Of The Infrastructure: Region Of Calculation And Energy Used,,,,,,,,,

Name: location
Question: location
Comment,,,,,,,,,: More Precise Location Like City,Region Or Datacenter Name,,,,,,,,

Name: powerSourceCarbonIntensity
Question: powerSourceCarbonIntensity
Comment,,,,,,,,,: Carbon Intensity Of The Electicity You Used (In Gco2Eq/Kwh),,,,,,,,,

Name: quality
Question: quality
Comment,,,,,,,,,: The Quality Of The Information You Provided,3 Possibilities : High (Percentage Error +/-10%),Medium (Percentage Error +/-25%),Low (Percentage Error +/-50%),,,,
